name: Persistence Via Notepad++ Plugins
description: Detects creation of new ".dll" files inside the plugins directory of a notepad++ installation by a process other than "gup.exe". Which could indicates possible persistence
false_positives: Possible FPs during first installation of Notepad++
Legitimate use of custom plugins to enhance notepad++ functionality by users
query: ((file.path:/.*\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Pp][Aa][Dd]\+\+\\[Pp][Ll][Uu][Gg][Ii][Nn][Ss]\\.*/ AND file.path:/.*\.[Dd][Ll][Ll]/) AND (NOT ((process.executable:/.*\\[Nn][Oo][Tt][Ee][Pp][Aa][Dd]\+\+\\[Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Rr]\\[Gg][Uu][Pp]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ss]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Aa]\\[Ll][Oo][Cc][Aa][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Mm][Pp]\\.*/ AND process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Aa][Rr][Gg][Ee][Tt]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((file.path:*\\Notepad\+\+\\plugins\\* AND file.path:*.dll) AND (NOT ((process.executable:*\\Notepad\+\+\\updater\\gup.exe) OR (process.executable:C\:\\Users\\* AND process.executable:*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\* AND process.executable:*\\target.exe))))`
